entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Snow mixed with rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming light near noon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
